channel.title: Logging into a server
channel.description:
I am currently running the server base. Project LTM (JSpeced V4)
I was wondering if anyone can help me so I would be able to log onto the server on a local host so I could code it. When i try to log in I just get the basic "Error connecting to server" message. [IMG]http://i456.photobucket.com/albums/qq288/DustinFTW/helpme.jpg[/img]
My msn is, Coolnezzz@hotmail.com I also have team viewer if you would rather use that.
